name: Ext_R5_SubscriptionStatus_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.SubscriptionStatus.status for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents SubscriptionStatus.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubscriptionStatus|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The status of the subscription, which marks the server state for managing the subscription.
element.comment: `SubscriptionStatus.status` maps to R4B `SubscriptionStatus.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The status of the subscription, which marks the server state for managing the subscription.
element.comment: `SubscriptionStatus.status` maps to R4B `SubscriptionStatus.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The status of a subscription at the time this notification was generated.
